definition: to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to join together/to lack/narrow and shallow
prefix or suffix of a compound word/affix (linguistics)
infix (grammar), particle attached within a word or expression
(lit.) to follow sb/(linguistics) suffix/ending/(computing) file name extension
variant of 弦誦不輟|弦诵不辍[xian2 song4 bu4 chuo4]
to gather and patch up sth that is badly damaged (idiom)

sentences.english: Yeah, I like the beading, and you wouldn't need jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我喜歡那些綴飾，那樣你就不需要戴首飾了。

sentences.english: To do this we clip the patches' bounding boxes against all six sides of the viewing frustum .
sentences.chinese: 我們用視見體的六個面去剪裁綴片的包圍盒。

sentences.english: All remaining patches are culled against the viewing frustum .
sentences.chinese: 剩下的綴片通過視見體進行剔除。

sentences.english: Little marzipan carrots are the traditional decoration.
sentences.chinese: 當地傳統上也用杏仁小餅和小胡蘿蔔作爲綴飾。

sentences.english: Affixing graphemes and defbrmable graphemes as well as basic graphemes reflect the prunitivity of Dongba characters.
sentences.chinese: 字素和字綴一起共同反映了東巴文字原始的一個側面。

sentences.english: Thus, drinking up the growth of knowledge slowly.
sentences.chinese: 從而，綴飲知識的瓊漿慢慢成長。

sentences.english: One lovely name adorns my song.
Methods Level-crossing technique and dressed states theory are used.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用能級交叉技術和綴飾態理論。

sentences.english: Overhead the chestnut branches were covered with blossom.
sentences.chinese: 栗子樹在我們頭頂撐開綴滿繁花的樹冠。

sentences.english: The dainty rhodium-plated bracelet features four stars.
sentences.chinese: 這款精巧細緻的手鍊綴以四顆星星。

sentences.english: And all the trembling flowers they bear.
sentences.chinese: 顫巍巍的花朵綴滿枝頭上。

sentences.english: All the different types of snow crystals can be found decorated with rime.
sentences.chinese: 所有不同類型的雪晶上都綴有霜。

sentences.english: Heat preservation and energy saving experiment using aluminized thermal screens in greenhouse was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 用國產綴鋁保溫膜幕在溫室內進行了保溫節能實驗。

sentences.english: The woman's long dress was beaded with silver.
sentences.chinese: 這女人的長衣綴有銀珠子。

definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
